    • 5.4.4. C++ Table Cursors

An ITTIA DB IoT™ database can be accessed through several different APIs in a variety of programming languages. The ITTIA DB IoT Embedded C API provides the lowest level interface to the database and thus the greatest flexibility.

Tip

The C and C++ APIs are available on all platforms supported by ITTIA DB IoT. Availability varies for other APIs.
